# realistic

**Type Property**

A value that renders a realistic, 3D map.

## Declaration

```swift
static var realistic: MapStyle.Elevation { get }
```

## Elevation styles

- **automatic**: The default elevation style, that renders a flat, 2D map.
- **flat**: A value that renders a flat, 2D map.

items.description: The default elevation style, that renders a flat, 2D map.
